description: Enables Windows Credential Guard by configuring Device Guard and LSA registry settings to secure credentials in memory. Optionally reboots the system for changes to take effect. Produces a JSON log with status and error details if any.

script_parameters.name: RebootAfter
script_parameters.description: If true, automatically reboots the system after enabling Credential Guard.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response JSON log path. Overwrites existing content.
